en.title: IT Support Staff
en.description: Provided daily IT support for Oracle E-Business Suite across inventory, purchasing, and production modules. Handled technical troubleshooting, user support, and data validation to ensure smooth ERP operations in the manufacturing environment.

list.title: Key Responsibilities
items: Provided day-to-day support for Oracle E-Business Suite, including troubleshooting issues in inventory, purchasing, and production modules.
Assisted end-users in transaction input, error checking, and system navigation to ensure smooth ERP operations.
Coordinated with regional IT teams and third-party vendors for ERP enhancements and technical issue resolution.
Performed data extraction and reporting for operational monitoring and decision-making support.
Maintained IT infrastructure within the manufacturing site, including hardware (PCs, printers, scanners) and network troubleshooting.
Supported internal IT audits by documenting workflows, access controls, and compliance reports.
Conducted basic training and user orientation for new system features or updates.

en.title: IT Senior Staff
en.description: Responsible for developing, implementing, and maintaining IT systems to support manufacturing business processes. Acted as a bridge between operational needs and technological solutions, focusing on ERP systems, process automation, and cross-departmental data integration.

list.title: Key Responsibilities
items: Managed and provided technical support for SAP Business One ERP, covering purchasing, production, warehouse, and finance modules.
Designed and developed internal applications using C#, JavaScript, and SQL to automate workflows and reporting.
Created and maintained analytical dashboards using Power BI for management and operational decision-making.
Analyzed user requirements, designed process flows, and conducted system testing and deployment.
Integrated data between systems, including ODBC connections, Crystal Reports, and SAP HANA database queries.
